page.title: 15TOURISM
page.content: In our area we get quite a lot of tourists.They are usually from cities and have very differert accents.The weather is very good in the summer and they go to beaches most often.The best ones are at Lyme Regis,West Bay and Charmouth.Some are on bicycles and go sight seeing,walking or picnics etc.Lewsdon and Pilsdon are often visited by walkers and cyclist.The odd couple may stay in a pub at night then go to beaches and other places like that at day and come back at night.They would have to stay in a summer cottage if not a pub in our area if they wanted to stay here.Because there aren't any hotels.
